item.text: So Bezalel and Oholiab and every skilled person in whom the Lord has put skill and ability to know how to do all the work for the service of the sanctuary are to do the work according to all that the Lord has commanded.”
Moses summoned Bezalel and Oholiab and every skilled person in whom the Lord had put skill—everyone whose heart stirred him to volunteer to do the work.

They <st data-num="03947" class="">received</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">from</st> <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="08641" class="">offerings</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478" class="">Israelites</st> had <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st> for the <st data-num="05656" class="">service</st> of the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st>, and <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">still</st> continued to <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> him a <st data-num="05071" class="">freewill offering</st> <st data-num="01242" class="">each</st> <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>.<n id="2" />

So <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02450" class="">skilled people</st> who were <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st> on the <st data-num="06944" class="">sanctuary</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> from the <st data-num="04399" class="">work</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="06213" class="">doing</st>
and told Moses, “The people are bringing much more than is needed for the completion of the work which the Lord commanded us to do!”
Moses instructed them to take his message throughout the camp, saying, “Let no man or woman do anymore work for the offering for the sanctuary.” So the people were restrained from bringing any more.
Now the materials were more than enough for them to do all the work.

All the skilled among those who were doing the work made the tabernacle with ten curtains of fine twisted linen and blue and purple and scarlet yarn; they were made with cherubim that were the work of an artistic designer.

The <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> was <st data-num="08083 06242 0520" class="">42 feet</st>, and the <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> was <st data-num="0702 0520" class="">6 feet</st>—the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">size</st> for <st data-num="03605" class="">each</st> of the <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st>.

He <st data-num="02266" class="">joined</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> of the <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">another</st>, and the other<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> he <st data-num="02266" class="">joined</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">another</st>.

He <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> of <st data-num="08504" class="">blue material</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="07098" class="">end</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> in the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="04225" class="">set</st>; he <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> the <st data-num="03651" class="">same</st> along the <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="07020" class="">end</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> in the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="04225" class="">set</st>.

He <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> on the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st>, and he <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> on the <st data-num="07097" class="">end</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> was in the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="04225" class="">set</st>, with the <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> <st data-num="06901" class="">opposite</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">another</st>.
He made 50 gold clasps and joined the curtains together to one another with the clasps, so that the tabernacle was a unit.
He made curtains of goats’ hair for a tent over the tabernacle; he made 11 curtains.

The <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> was <st data-num="07970 0520" class="">45 feet</st>, and the <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> was <st data-num="0702 0520">6 feet</st>—<st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">size</st> for all <st data-num="06249 06240" class="">11</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st>.

He <st data-num="02266" class="">joined</st> <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">by themselves</st> and <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtains</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">by themselves</st>.

He <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="07020" class="">end</st> <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> in the first <st data-num="04225" class="">set</st> and <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="03924" class="">loops</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> of the <st data-num="03407" class="">curtain</st> that <st data-num="02279" class="">joined</st> the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> set.

He <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">50</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> <st data-num="07165" class="">clasps</st> to <st data-num="02266" class="">join</st> the <st data-num="0168" class="">tent</st> <st data-num="02266">together</st> so that it might <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="0259" class="">unit</st>.<n id="1" />
He made a covering for the tent out of ram skins dyed red and over that a covering of fine leather.
He made the frames for the tabernacle of acacia wood as uprights.

The <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> of each<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> was <st data-num="06235 0520" class="">15 feet</st>, the <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> was <st data-num="0520 02677" class="">2¼ feet</st>,

with<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">projections</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">per</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> <st data-num="07947" class="">parallel</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">another</st>.<n id="2" /> He <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">in this way</st>.

So he <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> for the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>: <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> for the <st data-num="05045 08486" class="">south</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>.

He <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>—<st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> for its <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">projections</st>, and likewise<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">next</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> for its <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">projections</st>,

and for the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="06763" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>, the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, he <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="06242" class="">20</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>

and their <st data-num="0705" class="">40</st> <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st>, <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st> and <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0134" class="">bases</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="0259" class="">next</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07175" class="">frame</st>.

And for the <st data-num="03411" class="">back</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> on the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> he <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>.

He <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> for the <st data-num="04742" class="">corners</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> on the <st data-num="03411" class="">back</st>.

At the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="04740" class="">corners</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="08382" class="">doubled</st> <st data-num="04295" class="">at the lower end</st> and<n id="2" /> <st data-num="08535" class="">finished</st> <st data-num="03162" class="">together</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="07218" class="">top</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">ring</st>. <st data-num="03651" class="">So</st> he <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> for <st data-num="08147" class="">both</st>.
So there were eight frames and their silver bases, 16 bases, two bases under each frame.
He made bars of acacia wood, five for the frames on one side of the tabernacle

and <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="01280" class="">bars</st> for the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> on the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="06763" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st>, and <st data-num="02568" class="">five</st> <st data-num="01280" class="">bars</st> for the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st> of the <st data-num="04908" class="">tabernacle</st> for the <st data-num="03411" class="">back side</st> on the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st>.

He <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st> the <st data-num="08484" class="">middle</st> <st data-num="01280" class="">bar</st> to <st data-num="01272" class="">reach</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="07097" class="">end</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="07097" class="">end</st> in the <st data-num="08432" class="">center</st> of the <st data-num="07175" class="">frames</st>.
He overlaid the frames with gold and made their rings of gold to provide places for the bars, and he overlaid the bars with gold.
He made the special curtain of blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and fine twisted linen; he made it with cherubim, the work of an artistic designer.
He made for it four posts of acacia wood and overlaid them with gold, with gold hooks, and he cast for them four silver bases.
He made a hanging for the entrance of the tent of blue, purple, and scarlet yarn and fine twisted linen, the work of an embroiderer,
and its five posts and their hooks. He overlaid their tops and their bands with gold, but their five bases were bronze.
